amendment.description: Amendment increases the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority account by $1,000,000 to support increased R&D for biosecurity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority account by $1,000,000 to support increased R&D for biosecurity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 358 - 66 (Roll no. 273).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 358 - 66 (Roll no. 273).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Foster.
